comment: one of the worst professors I've ever had. directions and expectations were unclear and confusing, not to mention the spelling/grammar errors in all of her materials. She was often condescending and flat out rude in her feedback and interactions with students. the class is not well organized and assignments do not align with the order of readings
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: I took research methods with Dr. Rumiano online. the materials are very organized and she has video lectures every week. The class has a lot of homework, but if you do the work, you get an A. I liked that I had a lot of flexibility and I could meed with the professor on zoom every time I needed help.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Lecture heavy

comment: What a horrible professor. Didn't take anytime to actually engage with her students. Everything was expected to be known through screen shots on her computer and no actual explanation on how to do the assignment. We only had one actual virtual meeting and during that no one was able to actually let out a full sentence without her interrupting.

DO. NOT. TAKE. HER. I took her for an 8 week summer course and she made things hell. Instructions were never clear and straight to the point. writing assignments required so much and were difficult. weekly discussion post were also too much. her course only consisted of discussion post and essay's. there's someone easier, I promise you.
rating_tags: Tough grader--So many papers--Graded by few things

comment: She gives 3 tests ( third one is the final but isn't cumulative ), straightforward/easy reflection paper, and a lot of pop quizzes in person ( just completion grades). Tests are relatively easy because the pop quiz and textbook practice quiz questions are on it  ( you can just look up the answers on quizlet ). Easy in-person class!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Professor Rumiano is very knowledgeable about Research Methods. I took this class online and I was afraid I will not be able to keep up with the textbook. But dr rumiano provided extensive feedback to all class activities and her guidelines are very easy to follow. I definitely recommend her for this class.

She was very nice and organized. I received an A in the class but it wasn't handed to me. Assignments are pretty easy and I received high A's on all of the discussion posts and reflection papers. Does not provide feedback for grades or exams. Scored medium to high B's on each of the three exams. They were open note but some Qs weren't in textbook.

I took Sociology 1101 with Professor Rumiano, online. The only thing you do for this course is discussion posts. They are super easy and fairly interesting. You will not have a hard time with this class at all. She isn't a strict grader and she has her own methods of feedback. Overall, it was a easy course, I recommend taking her!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I wouldn't say she was bad at all, she just simply was very hard to get in touch with, I had some issues where I couldn't complete something along with other students and she rarely answered her email. Her grading can be a bit frustrating but all in all it wasn't essentially hard just make sure you complete ALL your assignments.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Social Class was an eye opening course. Dr. Rumiano is very nice and gets back to you the same day. I recommend this class to anyone interested in power and why rich people always land on their feet

I loved this class. Each student was part of a group that had to write an essay and be the discussion leader once during the semester. The topics were very interesting and Dr. Rumiano provided detailed feedback to our essays. The exams are not hard. I will definitely take her again.

Honestly would sometimes even forget about this class, it was online and the teacher rarely reached out unless it was to give out assignments. The assignments were very long and tedious but as long as you get it done and take the notes its pretty okay. Very neglectful teacher. Very harsh grader with little to no explanation, complicated assignments
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: dr Rumiano was the best teacher this semester. She wants you to succeed. definitely take her
Professor Rumiano is very helpful and she wants you to pass. The quizzes are hard but the discussion posts aren't. If you have troubles with the class just talk to her. She is very kind.
Great lectures and feedback Easy A She is very personable on Zoom
This was a difficult class but Dr. Rumiano's feedback made it very clear. She is very nice and responds to emails immediately. An A is not difficult but you have to do the work.

I'm not even sure what to say because this entire semester was kind of a joke. She would post an announcement before replying to your email to make it look like you weren't checking the classroom, or she would flat out ignore you. She would also be contradictory with her grading and what would be on the quizzes. Optional articles on the quiz.
Dr. Rumiano is a great professor. She answers to emails immediately and we talked on Zoom several times. Theory is not easy but Dr. Rumiano did everything she could to help me.
The class was easy and Dr. Rumiano is very nice. I will take her again if she teaches any of my classes.

I don't understand other reviews of her. I took her class (Social Theory), and she was great. Always covered the material clearly, maybe too much sometime. If you keep up with readings and assignments everything is spelled out. If you pay attention to annuncments class fairly straightforward and easy. Easy A for sure.

She was originally not supposed to be my teacher, there was a split in my former class and I ended up having her as my professor. The class was initially very easy and laid back but in the middle of the semester she randomly started cracking down on us. She is an extremely picky and hard grader. If you are forgetful she is not for you.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Tough grader
